alert.note: Alert for Big Stone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 1:58PM CST until January 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Big Stone County. In South Dakota, Roberts and Day Counties. * WHEN...From noon Monday to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
